title: Physical Literacy-Based Health Promotion Physical Education Instructional Design Training

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A self-directed training program for prospective physical education teachers applying physical literacy education principles.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of bodily literacy (BL) and principles of health promotion.
Learners can practice three instructional strategies for designing BL-based physical education lessons.
Learners complete at least 80% of a self-directed teacher training course utilizing digital tools.
Learners can develop a BL-integrated physical education assessment tool and receive peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
